mapper.insert: INSERT INTO exchange_rate (searchdate, cur_unit, result, ttb, tts, deal_bas_r, bkpr, yy_efe_r, ten_dd_efe_r, kftc_bkpr, kftc_deal_bas_r) VALUES (#{searchDate}, #{curUnit}, #{result}, #{ttb}, #{tts}, #{dealBasR}, #{bkpr}, #{yyEfeeR}, #{tenDdEfeeR}, #{kftcBkpr}, #{kftcDealBasR})
mapper.select: SELECT er.searchdate AS searchDate, -- 통화 코드 er.cur_unit AS curUnit, -- 통화 코드 erc.cur_nm AS curNm, -- 국가/통화명 er.deal_bas_r AS dealBasR, -- 매매 기준율 er.ttb AS ttb, -- 전신환(송금) 받으실때 er.tts AS tts -- 전신환(송금) 보내실때 FROM exchange_rate er JOIN exchange_rate_category erc ON er.cur_unit = erc.cur_unit WHERE er.searchdate = #{searchDate}
mapper.update: UPDATE exchange_rate SET result = #{result}, ttb = #{ttb}, tts = #{tts}, deal_bas_r = #{dealBasR}, bkpr = #{bkpr}, yy_efe_r = #{yyEfeeR}, ten_dd_efe_r = #{tenDdEfeeR}, kftc_bkpr = #{kftcBkpr}, kftc_deal_bas_r = #{kftcDealBasR} WHERE searchdate = #{searchDate} AND cur_unit = #{curUnit}
